abstract: “Star Wars Rebels: Sparks of Rebellion,” an animated movie designed to jump-start Disney’s new series based on the franchise, drew 6.5 million viewers worldwide.
snippet: “Star Wars Rebels: Sparks of Rebellion,” an animated movie designed to jump-start Disney’s new series based on the franchise, drew 6.5 million viewers worldwide.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — “Star Wars Rebels: Spark of Rebellion,” an animated movie aimed at beginning a new era for the Lucasfilm space franchise, attracted 2.7 million viewers, including 1.3 million children 2 to 11, in its Disney Channel premiere on Friday, according to Nielsen data released late Monday.

headline.main: Modest Introduction for Disney’s Animated ‘Star Wars’ Endeavor
